医学新闻来自 News-Medical.Net - 来自世界各地的最新医学新闻和研究https://www.news-medical.net/ en-GB
加纳“造林者”Tonyrinaudo 在诺尔现场践行世界愿景，走向绿色总部位于柏林的高科技实验室测量设备制造商 KNAUER 于 2024 年 5 月 29 日在其工厂举办了一场有 120 名嘉宾参加的可持续发展活动。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240604/Go-green-in-Ghana-e28098forestmakere28099-Tonyrinaudo-with-world-vision-on-site-at-Knauer.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240604/Go-green-in-Ghana-e28098forestmakere28099-Tonyrinaudo-with-world-vision-on-site-at-Knauer.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=49f3e90c-861b-4564-a36c-06c206724520 Tue, 04 Jun 2024 08:28:00 -0400 Go green in Ghana ‘forestmaker’ Tonyrinaudo with world vision on site at Knauer
Applied Cells 发布改变游戏规则的试剂盒，促进细胞疗法的开发Applied Cells 很高兴地宣布推出 MARS® Ingenuity™ 试剂盒，可实现快速、轻松的细胞分离。该创新产品线采用 RUO 和 GMP 级试剂，并经过专门优化，可在 Applied Cells 专有的 MARS® Bar 平台上使用。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240604/Applied-Cells-releases-game-changing-reagent-kits-to-empower-cell-therapy-development.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240604/Applied-Cells-releases-game-changing-reagent-kits-to-empower-cell-therapy-development.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=5f89fd8d-c585-42dc-8e0b-41b28be13213 Tue, 04 Jun 2024 08:06:00 -0400 Applied Cells releases game-changing reagent kits to empower cell therapy development
PhoreMost 与勃林格殷格翰达成目标发现联盟里程碑PhoreMost Ltd. 在与勃林格殷格翰的多项目目标发现合作中触发了里程碑式的付款。这是通过识别和验证新靶标来实现的，这些新靶标支持勃林格殷格翰开发一流疗法、改变患者生活的雄心。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240604/PhoreMost-reaches-milestone-in-a-target-discovery-alliance-with-Boehringer-Ingelheim.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240604/PhoreMost-reaches-milestone-in-a-target-discovery-alliance-with-Boehringer-Ingelheim.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=bfc0500a-ccf5-4bbc-9d8b-aa070505bf51 Tue, 04 Jun 2024 07:52:00 -0400
研究：不到四分之一的心脏病患者在事后接受饮食咨询一项研究发现，尽管饮食是美国因心脏病过早死亡的主要原因，但只有不到四分之一的经历重大心脏病的人在事后接受了饮食咨询。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240604/Study-Fewer-than-one-quarter-of-heart-attack-病人-receive-dietary-counseling-in-the-aftermath.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240604/Study-Fewer-than-one-quarter-of-heart-attack-病人-receive-dietary-counseling-in-the-aftermath.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=37abd952-680d-41e4-973b-e1559d52fc82 Tue, 04 Jun 2024 07:45:54 -0400 Study: Fewer than one-quarter of heart attack patients receive dietary counseling in the aftermath
阻断 CDK7 蛋白可以预防与癌症治疗相关的心脏损伤华盛顿州立大学科学家领导的一项研究表明，阻断一种名为 CDK7 的蛋白质可以预防与常用癌症化疗药物相关的心脏损伤。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240604/Blocking-CDK7- Protein-could-prevent-heart-damage-linked-with-cancer-treatment.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240604/Blocking-CDK7- Protein-could-prevent-heart-damage-linked-with-cancer-treatment.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=d624f19a-8cda-4252-8ae3-e48db55f7059 Tue, 04 Jun 2024 07:13:43 -0400 Blocking CDK7 protein could prevent heart damage associated with cancer treatment
研究揭示了治疗从不吸烟肺癌的新途径肺癌的主要原因是吸烟。然而，从不吸烟者的肺癌发病率一直在稳步上升，尤其是女性。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240604/Research-reveals-new-pathways-for-treating-never-smoker-lung-cancer.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240604/Research-reveals-new-pathways-for-treating-never-smoker-lung-cancer.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=85a7a36c-2882-4076-8716-18beb9fd83e7 Tue, 04 Jun 2024 07:03:31 -0400 Research reveals new pathways for treating never-smoker lung cancer
在 LGBTQ+ 活动人士的敦促下，加州各城市考虑实施更严格的吸烟规定加州长期以来一直处于反吸烟斗争的最前沿，但旧金山湾区的一些地方官员在特别关注 LGBTQ+ 社区高吸烟率的活动人士的支持下，正在带头提出进一步限制烟草的提案。出售和熏制的地方。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240604/Urged-on-by-LGBTQ2b-activists-California-cities-weigh-stricter-smoking-rules.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240604/Urged-on-by-LGBTQ2b-activists-California-cities-weigh-stricter-smoking-rules.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=6ddf0aab-4776-43a0-bc84-14195af1848c Tue, 04 Jun 2024 06:46:40 -0400 Urged on by LGBTQ+ activists, California cities weigh stricter smoking rules
一条胳膊和一条腿：医疗补助受益人很难保持注册状态自 2023 年春季以来，医疗补助计划（针对低收入和残疾人的美国州联邦医疗保险计划）已削减了超过 2200 万名受益人。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240604/An-Arm-and-a-Leg-Medicaid-recipients-struggle-to-stay-enrolled.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240604/An-Arm-and-a-Leg-Medicaid-recipients-struggle-to-stay-enrolled.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=931038b8-f3b6-4a8e-a31f-98d77dc32a4e Tue, 04 Jun 2024 06:44:56 -0400 An Arm and a Leg: Medicaid recipients struggle to stay enrolled
新研究发现，长期感染新冠病毒会增加勃起功能障碍的风险与急性新冠病毒相比，长期冠状病毒病 (COVID) 诊断后发生勃起功能障碍 (ED) 的风险。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240604/Long-COVID-linked-to-higher-risk-of-erectile-dysfunction-new-study-finds.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240604/Long-COVID-linked-to-higher-risk-of-erectile-dysfunction-new-study-finds.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=4fa7e8b3-026a-45f4-9a0a-3007df2182e4 Tue, 04 Jun 2024 06:33:00 -0400 Long COVID linked to higher risk of erectile dysfunction, new study finds
子宫颈器官芯片为下一代宿主-微生物组相互作用研究铺平了道路一组研究人员开发了人体宫颈器官芯片来模拟宫颈界面。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240604/Cervix-organ-chips-pave-the-way-for-next- Generation-studies-on-host-microbiome-interactions.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240604/Cervix-organ-chips-pave-the-way-for-next- Generation-studies-on-host-microbiome-interactions.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=034f088b-714e-4b7d-aaf6-006fea34cefb Tue, 04 Jun 2024 06:03:00 -0400 Cervix organ chips pave the way for next-generation studies on host-microbiome interactions
